name: Nonelands (Alpha Demo)
description:
NoneLands is a 3d plartformer game with some RPG elements that will count with some levels. This game is inspired in adventure games like Okami, Tomb Raider, Legend of Zelda and Mario 3d sagas (in the platformer aspect).

The basic concept is that this game rescue a bit of the 3d platformer genre which have been displaced these days. NoneLands will be focused in exploration, puzzles and a good story.

Note: The game isn't currently in active development.

Navigate the menu using WASD, SPACEBAR to select and ESC to go back or close.
